!Hunters Guild Member Grey: So, you wish to take the 2-circle hunting license test? Well I suppose you're up to giving it a try. As before, in the 2-circle test you must bring back at least three items written on the list. Of course, these items will be harder to obtain than those of the 1-circle test. Maybe you should look at the list first... [Quest _335_TheSongOfTheHunter 30744_10.htm|View list]
